metadata.title: CVE-2014-7839 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
DocumentProvider in RESTEasy 2.3.7 and 3.0.9 does not configure the (1)external-general-entities or (2) external-parameter-entities features,which allows remote attackers to conduct XML external entity (XXE) attacksvia unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libresteasy-java - 3.0.6-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: resteasy package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.6-2').
